org.wise.vle.domain.webservice.crater

Class CRaterHttpClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.wise.vle.domain.webservice.crater.CRaterHttpClient

  • public class CRaterHttpClient
extends Object
    Controller for using the CRater scoring servlet via HTTP
    Author:
    Hiroki Terashima, Geoffrey Kwan

      CRaterHttpClient()

      static String getConcepts(String cRaterResponseXML)
      Gets and Returns the Concepts from the CRater response XML string, or "" if it does not exist.
      static String getCRaterScoringResponse(String cRaterUrl, String cRaterClientId, String itemId, String responseId, String studentData)
      Sends student work to the CRater server and receives the score as the response

      Makes a request to the CRater server for the scoring rubric for a specific item id.

      Gets and Returns the Score from the CRater response XML string, or -1 if it does not exist.

      Handles POSTing a CRater Request to the CRater Servlet and returns the CRater response string.

    • Method Detail

      • post

        public static String post(String cRaterUrl,
                          String bodyData)
        Handles POSTing a CRater Request to the CRater Servlet and returns the CRater response string.
        Parameters:
        cRaterUrl - the CRater url
        bodyData - the xml body data to be sent to the CRater server
        Returns:
        the response from the CRater server

      • getCRaterScoringResponse

        public static String getCRaterScoringResponse(String cRaterUrl,
                                              String cRaterClientId,
                                              String itemId,
                                              String responseId,
                                              String studentData)
        Sends student work to the CRater server and receives the score as the response
        Parameters:
        cRaterUrl - the CRater scoring url
        cRaterClientId - the client id e.g. WISETEST
        itemId - the item id e.g. Photo_Sun
        responseId - the node state timestamp
        studentData - the student work
        Returns:
        responseBody as a String, or null if there was an error during the request to CRater.

      • getCRaterVerificationResponse

        public static String getCRaterVerificationResponse(String cRaterUrl,
                                                   String cRaterClientId,
                                                   String itemId)
        Makes a request to the CRater server for the scoring rubric for a specific item id.
        Parameters:
        cRaterUrl - the CRater verification url
        cRaterClientId - the client id e.g. WISETEST
        itemId - the item id e.g. Photo_Sun
        Returns:
        the scoring rubric for the item id

      • getScore

        public static int getScore(String cRaterResponseXML)
        Gets and Returns the Score from the CRater response XML string, or -1 if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        cRaterResponseXML - response XML from the CRater. Looks like this:
        Returns:
        integer score returned from the CRater. In the case above, this method will return 4.

      • getConcepts

        public static String getConcepts(String cRaterResponseXML)
        Gets and Returns the Concepts from the CRater response XML string, or "" if it does not exist.
        Parameters:
        cRaterResponseXML - response XML from the CRater. Looks like this:
        Returns:
        String concepts returned from the CRater. In the case above, this method will return "1,2,3,4,5".
